titles.title: Expressing the Sense of Congress on the Humanitarian Crisis in Iraq.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/14/2008--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that: (1) the Iraqi refugee crisis must be addressed before it becomes a major factor in the destabilization of Iraq and an increasing threat to U.S. security; and (2) the United States should support the Iraqi Red Crescent Organization in their work to provide humanitarian relief to the people of Iraq.
